channel.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_qheVw4eIGv8/TBOPq1heS3I/AAAAAAAABQU/O-2uRbps9Jw/s320/arts-karate-kid-584.jpg[/img][/center]
There's a lot to swallow with this new Karate Kid-- you have to accept that privileged child of Hollywood Jaden Smith is now a movie star, that a remake of a beloved 80s classic isn't automatically a travesty, and that about an hour and a half's worth of good material within a two and a half hour running time is a reasonable ratio. In any other summer, it might not be worth the trip, but summer 2010 is proving to be unusually dismal, and at this point there are worse things than sitting in the air conditioning, marveling at some beautiful cinematography and excellent fight choreography, and witnessing the acting rebirth of Jackie Chan.

The movie was decent, its not one of the best but it was something.

item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

tbh the first one was good, but i just can’t watch a remake in a 10 yr old kid form, actor must be at least 15+ for it to be reasonable imo.

right now it feels like some walt disney shit

item.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:10, topic:344276”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=440660.msg3238657#msg3238657 date=1276716607]
Why, oh why do they make remakes?

Know what? I’ll make a remake of a nice painting! Will post soon!

Edit: Here you go! I made a remake, instead of being creative myself.
[/quote]brb making hi-res and putting up on my wall[/quote]

Oh no! Piracy! I spent a lot of time making my remake, and now you don’t pay me? This is going to end in another financial disaster!

item.description:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:6, topic:344276”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=440660.msg3238409#msg3238409 date=1276693594]

“The Nigger Kid” [size=5pt]Who knows Karate[/size]

Please. Will smith is the whitest black actor alive, and one of the best actors at that.

We’re talking about his son!

Was a shitty movie.

No, you troll. Oh wait, you were busy programming Java while watching the movie. LoL.
[/quote]No, it really was shit. Typical bad hollywood flick.[/quote]

I agree,the movie sucked.

In any other summer, it might not be worth the trip, but summer 2010 is proving to be unusually dismal, and at this point there are worse things than sitting in the air conditioning, marveling at some beautiful cinematography and excellent fight choreography, and witnessing the acting rebirth of Jackie Chan.
